overview: As the head of Asia Pacific, John Orrock is responsible for GlobalOne’s Philippine offshore delivery operation, expanding the region’s business and service offerings. With 20 years of international technology consulting experience, John has a solid foundation on which to grow GlobalOne’s Asia Pacific business. John founded OKERE, the first enterprise level salesforce.com partner and leading cloud computing services provider, in 2003 with offices in New York, London and Sydney. OKERE was acquired by Fujitsu Consulting in 2007.
